metadata.title: CVE-2018-25052 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability has been found in Catalyst-Plugin-Session up to 0.40 andclassified as problematic. This vulnerability affects the function_load_sessionid of the file lib/Catalyst/Plugin/Session.pm of the componentSession ID Handler. The manipulation of the argument sid leads to crosssite scripting. The attack can be initiated remotely. Upgrading to version0.41 is able to address this issue. The name of the patch is88d1b599e1163761c9bd53bec53ba078f13e09d4. It is recommended to upgrade theaffected component. VDB-216958 is the identifier assigned to thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: libcatalyst-plugin-session-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
